product_overview: Flyout Tours Hub is a premium web application designed to offer a seamless platform for tourists and residents to discover and book tours, adventures, and experiences in the UAE, including Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and other emirates. It combines modern design with robust functionality to deliver a smooth booking experience with authenticated profiles, categorized browsing, and secure checkout.
core_goals: Provide a visually engaging and user-friendly booking platform for tours and activities in the UAE.
Enable secure user authentication and profile management for personalized experiences.
Facilitate efficient product discovery through categorized browsing and search functionalities.
Support a comprehensive booking system with cart management and order tracking.
Deliver responsive and interactive design optimized for multiple devices.
Ensure performance optimization for fast loading and smooth user experience.
key_features: Authentication & User Profiles: Email/password sign in and sign up with Supabase Auth; user dashboard to view booking history and manage profile; secure access with protected routes.
Product Discovery: Browse by destination and category; detailed product pages with dynamic pricing, image galleries, and location maps; related recommendations.
Search Functionality: Global search bar to quickly find products by name or keywords.
Booking System: Cart management to add, remove, and update items; wishlist functionality; secure checkout with payment success and cancellation handling.
User Dashboard: Access to booking history and profile management for authenticated users.
Static Content Pages: About Us, Contact Us, Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, Refund, and Cancellation Policies.
Responsive & Modern UI: Use of Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI components, glassmorphism effects, and high-quality visuals for premium experience.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or signs in via email/password authentication processed through Supabase Auth.
Authenticated users access a personalized dashboard displaying booking history and profile details.
Users browse experiences by category or destination using categorized browsing, or search using the global search bar.
From product listings, users view detailed product pages with descriptions, pricing options, images, and location info.
Users add desired experiences to cart, manage cart items, and optionally save items to a wishlist.
Users proceed to checkout where payment is processed (currently mocked) with handling for success or cancellation states.
Post-booking, users can view order history and manage bookings from their dashboard.
validation_criteria: Authentication flows must secure user data and enable smooth sign in, sign up, and callback handling.
Browsing and search must return accurate and relevant tour/product results consistently.
Cart management functionality must correctly update item quantities, additions, and removals in real-time.
Checkout flow must appropriately handle payment success and cancellation states.
User dashboard must accurately display booking history and allow profile management for authenticated users.
Static pages should be accessible and correctly render up-to-date company and policy information.
The application UI must be fully responsive, load efficiently, and maintain high performance metrics such as LCP and CLS.
Server and client data states must maintain consistency using React Query and Context API integration.
